name: Save Dash
description:
Save Dash is a simple yet challenging hardcore running arcade game.

All you need to do is to jump through 18 different sectors and save a small creature called Dash.

Game features:
* Stunning graphic
* Blood or no blood option
* 18 unique sectors
* 3 difficulty levels: Normal, Hard and Insane
* 11 different ways how Dash can die
* 31 unique achievements
* Leaderboards

and more will come…

10ravens team
